channel.title: Source list help required please
channel.description:
So not sure what happened to be honest but need to resolve it obviously. :woozy_face:
Fiddling here > https://dev.to/rafael_mori/kicksecure-hardening-your-linux-systems-security-debian-morph-2bf2
and here >> https://salsa.debian.org/extrepo-team/extrepo
![Screenshot_2025-04-16_12-32-14|690x300](upload://dQ61kG92trC6CO3Q6gAmnIKurMY.png)
Now I am unable to update! ``` sudo apt update E: Conflicting values set for option Signed-By regarding source tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com/ bookworm: /usr/share/keyrings/derivative.asc != /var/lib/extrepo/keys/kicksecure.asc E: The list of sources could not be read.
``` Please advise on what I need to do. Fresh install of Kicksecure to laptop,
**SOLVED** romoved fro etc\source list

item.title: Source list help required please
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This happens when enabling Kicksecure repository twice.

  • enabling creating file /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list
  • by using extrepo

These methods cannot, should not be combined. But if they are combined, one or the other method needs to be undone.

Read full topic

item.title: Source list help required please
item.dc:creator: BlackwolfOz
item.description:
So not sure what happened to be honest but need to resolve it obviously.

Fiddling here > Kicksecure: Hardening Your Linux System’s Security (Debian Morph) - DEV Community

and here >> External repositories team / extrepo · GitLab

Now I am unable to update!

sudo apt update
E: Conflicting values set for option Signed-By regarding source tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com/ bookworm: /usr/share/keyrings/derivative.asc != /var/lib/extrepo/keys/kicksecure.asc
E: The list of sources could not be read.

Please advise on what I need to do. Fresh install of Kicksecure to laptop,

SOLVED romoved fro etc\source list

Read full topic
